channel.title: Starting a server?
channel.description:
I have looked through a few pages of help boards and i havent really found this...if the question is not right(dunno how but anyway)then just tell me or if you are a mod and this question should have REALLY not been asked here then feel free to contact me(pm...)or whatever else you want to do...Thanks for your help!!!
I know that this may sound very wierd to some people but i am only 12 and i just about 10 minutes ago thought...why don't i make a private server? So i already got a source or whatever you call it...its Allstar(no suggestions for source plz!!! thanks)Now that i have the source what do i do?

item.title: Starting a server?
item.dc:creator: @nickehh nickehh
item.description:
@nickehh wrote:

You all are complete idiots… He cant just “edit” it… He doesnt know java, and he doesnt have the right stuff…

cool u got sorce now edit clint.java, wifout lrning java

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

There ya go…

item.title: Starting a server?
item.dc:creator: @Legend_Fate Legend Fate
item.description:
@Legend_Fate wrote:

Its not weird that your only 12, alot of the best coders here are young. I would reccomend you learn some java before you start working on your server. Follow the guides in the server/client tutorials and you will do fine. Good luck

Read full topic
